description: The National Disaster inventory is a record of Natural Disasters including floods, thunderstorms, forest fires, mudslides and disease outbreaks etc. The inventory keeps track of the losses of life destruction of property and infrastructure, injury and displacement due to these incidents.

name: 1999-2013 National Natural Disaster Inventory
